title: Eric Clapton - 1970 Solo Album - Rare Lost Polydor Tapes CD2
description:
By request, here is Disc 2 of the Lost Polydor Tapes. These are alternate mixes, mono versions and outtakes from the Eric Clapton 1970 solo album sessions. You'll find further historic info at the Disk 1 torrent, which I upped a few days ago... Here's the lineup of disk 2:

01. Lonesome And A Long Way From Home (^)
02. Easy Now (^)
03. Bad Boy (^)
04. Bad Boy (^)
05. Lonesome And A Long Way From Home (^)
06. After Midnight (^)
07. Lovin' You Lovin' Me (^)
08. Don't Know Why (^)
09. Bottle Of Red Wine (^)
10. Slunky (%)
11. Bad Boy (%)
12. Lonesome And A Long Way From Home (%)
13. After Midnight (%)
14. Easy Now (%)
15. Blues Power (%)
16. Bottle Of Red Wine (%)
17. Lovin' You Lovin' Me (%)
18. Told You For The Last Time (@)
19. Don't Know Why (@)
20. Let It Rain (@)

Keys:
(^): alternate mix
(%): mono version
(@): outtakes


Enjoy and seeeeeed!!
